name: Logical Stones
overview: This single screen 2D puzzler's game design by Neszt Tibor (Eddy); game ideas by Neszt Tibor (Eddy), Pallagi János (Enigma), Krasznai Szabolcs (Fred), Székely Viktor (Jimy) and Steve Holex. Coding by Neszt Tibor (Eddy). Graphics by Pallagi János (Enigma), Krasznai Szabolcs (Fred) and Székely Viktor (Jimy); sprites by Steve Holex. Sound samples by Székely Viktor (Jimy). The full version of the game has 60 playable and practice puzzle levels, many new tunes, level editor and saved functionality. Move the stones to the exit marked by an X. Blue stones are standard, red moves other stones and green are teleport stones. Move fast, time is running out.
